name: Shantak
languages: understands Common and Void Speech, but can’t speak

actions.desc: The shantak makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its talons.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Talons

actions.desc: The shantak emits a horrific screech. Each non-shantak creature within 60 feet of it that can hear it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be frightened until the end of the shantak’s next turn. The shantak can choose to include or exclude its rider when using this action.
actions.name: Insane Tittering (Recharge 4-6)

special_abilities.desc: Magical darkness doesn’t impede the shantak’s darkvision.
special_abilities.name: Eldritch Sight

special_abilities.desc: The shantak doesn’t provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy’s reach.
special_abilities.name: Flyby

special_abilities.desc: The shantak has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.
special_abilities.name: Keen Sight and Smell

special_abilities.desc: The shantak has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance

special_abilities.desc: The shantak has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the shantak’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn’t incapacitated.
special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics

special_abilities.desc: A shantak’s hide is very slippery. A rider can dismount a shantak without any penalty to movement speed. If an effect moves the shantak against its will while a creature is on it, the creature must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or fall off the shantak, landing prone in a space within 5 feet of it. If a rider is knocked prone or unconscious while mounted, it must make the same saving throw. In addition, the shantak can attempt to shake off a rider as a bonus action, forcing the rider to make the saving throw to stay mounted.
special_abilities.name: Unctuous Hide
